## utils.Size.equals() method

Compares sizes for equality.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static equals(a?: Size | null, b?: Size | null): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md) \| null | _(Optional)_ A Size. |
|  b | [Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md) \| null | _(Optional)_ A Size. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True iff the sizes have equal widths and equal heights, or if both are null.
